summary: A devil is a character that represents evil in many cultures and religions. It's often shown as a scary, powerful being, like a dragon or a beast. People believe the devil can take many forms and has different names, such as Satan, Lucifer, or Iblis. Sometimes, the devil is seen as a bad angel or a part of God, but most think it's a separate, evil force. Artists and writers use the devil in their work to show different ideas about evil.
title: Devil
